line.comment: * no dead factions, no Player before his first sector and no Yaki before their revolution
* rubberbanding spec bonus for main factions based on comparison with Terraformers
* Xenon territory size + OCV power must have dropped far enough
* go back to original relations from the Galaxy Generator and reactivate player permanent wars
* for the player we also need to check if he didnt already break his truce
* if he is still clean we extend his truce timer one last time
* all others sign one more truce if possible
* freighters - how many % of our previous ships did we loose recently?
* territory size comparison to other commonwealth factions
* military power comparison to other commonwealth factions
* OCV portal distance comparison to other commonwealth factions
* Secondary Threat in our alerted but not claimed sectors (including OCV/Xenon)
* example: Khaak Queen fleet has about 20 average strength
* resource reserve 0 = starving, 1 = low, 2 = medium, 3 = high
* we can only leave defense mode once we have rebuilt a big military
* if we were not defensive before we always start with neutral stance
* champion doesn't care about caution or defense
* we need to reduce our offense
* we have become weaker than average and want peace
* we go in full defense panic mode
* we need to reduce our offense so that our small military can still defend our many sectors
* we are still fine as long as we have lots of resources left
* once we start running low we better make peace
* we are only worried once we start running low on resources
* we are undisputed champion (can be reckless)
* we are among the strongest factions and rich (can be confident)
* we have access to shared resources and can continue our offense even when poor
* the champion can be stupid until he starts running out of resources
* Secondary Threat (only outside faction war/claimed sectors !!!)
* 40% of ourfleet power! (switch to panic mode/full defense)
* 20% of our fleet power! (start doing less offensive faction war)
* its not just lots of weak ships, pull the cavalry away from faction war!
* our secondary enemies are so weak that we can be more aggressive in the faction war, if we also got spare resources
* if we didn't loose freighters we cannot have a pirate problem!
* how many pirates would be appropriate vs. our reality
* we order extra Police squadrons if we have resources or more Escorts if not. But if the pirates are really troublesome we don't need spare resources.
* pirates trouble us so much that we generally get more cautious and want peace with everyone
* start blacklisting furthest away enclaves and never exceed 20% of total territory!
* if we had to use it before we don't like switching it off too early
* leaving flySafe based on resource Status
* something has put us into full defense panic mode
* we order an extra rearguard to ensure our survival
* Battlegroups - to prepare a future counterattack, or when very rich, or during a global Xenon crisis
* Task Forces during important main faction conflicts
* declare because Terraformers already have enough progress
* maybe declare prematurely because factions want it
* more difficult to sway Terracorp based on how far away Terraformers progress still is from Terracorp goals
* sign player truce - gets refreshed by ZH.Monitor
* create OCV hunter fleets, further maintained by ZH.Monitor
* new Truces between NPCs (these are basically non-aggression pacts. Only standard truces but which are constantly refreshed by ZH.Monitor)
* use most of your Battlegroups against high value adjacent Xenon sectors and not against other factions
* different CI types based on offensive strategy
* slowly repair global distrust against player (-5% and -1) Truces are only offered to player if this is 0

sval.val: no dead factions, no Player before his first sector and no Yaki before their revolution
rubberbanding spec bonus for main factions based on comparison with Terraformers
Xenon territory size + OCV power must have dropped far enough
go back to original relations from the Galaxy Generator and reactivate player permanent wars
for the player we also need to check if he didnt already break his truce
if he is still clean we extend his truce timer one last time
all others sign one more truce if possible
freighters - how many % of our previous ships did we loose recently?
territory size comparison to other commonwealth factions
military power comparison to other commonwealth factions
OCV portal distance comparison to other commonwealth factions
Secondary Threat in our alerted but not claimed sectors (including OCV/Xenon)
example: Khaak Queen fleet has about 20 average strength
resource reserve 0 = starving, 1 = low, 2 = medium, 3 = high
we can only leave defense mode once we have rebuilt a big military
if we were not defensive before we always start with neutral stance
champion doesn't care about caution or defense
we need to reduce our offense
we have become weaker than average and want peace
we go in full defense panic mode
we need to reduce our offense so that our small military can still defend our many sectors
we are still fine as long as we have lots of resources left
once we start running low we better make peace
we are only worried once we start running low on resources
we are undisputed champion (can be reckless)
we are among the strongest factions and rich (can be confident)
we have access to shared resources and can continue our offense even when poor
the champion can be stupid until he starts running out of resources
Secondary Threat (only outside faction war/claimed sectors !!!)
40% of ourfleet power! (switch to panic mode/full defense)
20% of our fleet power! (start doing less offensive faction war)
its not just lots of weak ships, pull the cavalry away from faction war!
our secondary enemies are so weak that we can be more aggressive in the faction war, if we also got spare resources
if we didn't loose freighters we cannot have a pirate problem!
how many pirates would be appropriate vs. our reality
we order extra Police squadrons if we have resources or more Escorts if not. But if the pirates are really troublesome we don't need spare resources.
pirates trouble us so much that we generally get more cautious and want peace with everyone
start blacklisting furthest away enclaves and never exceed 20% of total territory!
if we had to use it before we don't like switching it off too early
leaving flySafe based on resource Status
something has put us into full defense panic mode
we order an extra rearguard to ensure our survival
Battlegroups - to prepare a future counterattack, or when very rich, or during a global Xenon crisis
Task Forces during important main faction conflicts
declare because Terraformers already have enough progress
maybe declare prematurely because factions want it
more difficult to sway Terracorp based on how far away Terraformers progress still is from Terracorp goals
sign player truce - gets refreshed by ZH.Monitor
create OCV hunter fleets, further maintained by ZH.Monitor
new Truces between NPCs (these are basically non-aggression pacts. Only standard truces but which are constantly refreshed by ZH.Monitor)
use most of your Battlegroups against high value adjacent Xenon sectors and not against other factions
different CI types based on offensive strategy
slowly repair global distrust against player (-5% and -1) Truces are only offered to player if this is 0
